page.title: 04Rozel Campsite
page.content: Rozel Campsite covers 3.5 acres of land, and is open from the lst April to 3Oth September. Four members of the Germaine family run the business and four staff are employed. It can cater for 2OO people per day plus children under twelve. The busiest months are July and August, when mainly British families stay there. The campsite is advertised through Tourism who distribute brochures. In the peak season the cost is Â£3.2O per person, per day, with reductions for chidren. There are several amenities on the campsite. These include a shop, showers, wash basins, toilets and a laundry room. There is a snack bar, restaurant, television and games room. The campsite has its own swimming pool and for the children there are swings, slides, a climbing frame and crazy golf.
